DataElement.preferredName: Patient Biopsy Timepoint Consent Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study that addresses  patient is wiliness to go though a biopsy at specific time point as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Biopsy Timepoint Consent Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event._Permission to do something._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient willing to undergo
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to undergo tumor biopsies at three timepoints: (1) pre-treatment; (2) after one week of rhIL12; and (3) after 2 cycles of pembrolizumab (MK-3475)  -IL12 (i.e., approximately 7 weeks from the first dose of rhIL-12)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient agree to baseline biopsy and blood samples?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Dose Expansion: Is patient willing and able to undergo pre- and on- treatment biopsies?
